name: Microwave Baked Apples
author: Nicole M.
summary: This is an easy and fast baked apple recipe.  Great for brunch or snack. Stuff the apples with any additional fruits that you wish -- cranberries stuffed into apples are especially delicious.
directions: Core the apples, leaving the bottom intact
In a bowl, mix the brown sugar, cinnamon and nutmeg
Spoon the sugar mixture into the apples and  set a teaspoon (or more to your taste) of butter on top of each apple
Place the apples in a deep casserole dish and cover
Microwave for 3  1/2 to 4 minutes or until tender
Let the apples sit for a couple minutes before serving
